definition: the slightest amount or degree/a bit
silk/thread/trace/(cuisine) shreds or julienne strips/CL:條|条[tiao2]/classifier: a thread (of cloud, smoke etc), a bit, an iota, a hint (of sth) etc
hair/drawing brush/(in the) least/one thousandth/currency unit, 0.1 yuan
accurate to perfection (idiom)/precise to the finest detail

sentences.english: The occasional Damara and Herero homesteads bear no trace of the Germanic penchant for order;
sentences.chinese: 的临时家园丝毫不没有留下日耳曼人的倾向。

sentences.english: The bull artist, on the other hand, cares nothing for truth or falsehood.
sentences.chinese: 扯淡艺术家，另一方面，丝毫不关心真实或谎言。

sentences.english: Yet pretending you have never been in my heart.
sentences.chinese: 却还得故意装作丝毫没把你放在心里。

sentences.english: He did not feel any real enmity toward Colleen.
sentences.chinese: 他对科琳不抱丝毫敌意。

sentences.english: Nothing about him gave any suggestion of a child lost in the middle of the desert, a thousand miles from any human habitation.
sentences.chinese: 他丝毫不象是一个迷失在旷无人烟的大沙漠中的孩子。

sentences.english: My truck seemed to have no problem with the black ice that covered the roads.
sentences.chinese: 我的卡车似乎丝毫不受路面上那层黑冰的影响。

sentences.english: East dont hurt no hesitation promised to down.
sentences.chinese: 东方不败丝毫没有犹豫答应下来。

sentences.english: The army is nothing against pay the fee rates, and frightening.
sentences.chinese: 军无丝毫之饷反需交此费者，古今骇闻也。

sentences.english: He ignored shouts begging him to stop and sign autographs.
sentences.chinese: 他丝毫不理会粉丝求他停下来签名的喊叫声。

sentences.english: His painting is an exact copy of the original.
sentences.chinese: 他的画是与原作丝毫不差的临摹作品。

sentences.english: This must be handled well. No negligence is permitted.
sentences.chinese: 定当，不能有丝毫的疏忽。

sentences.english: Grim situation, let superintend branch and certificate business grass-roots unit not dare a bit is lax.
sentences.chinese: 严重的形势，让监管部门和券商基层都不敢丝毫松懈。

sentences.english: The Buddha has always warned us against karmic retribution.
sentences.chinese: 佛说因果报应丝毫不爽。

sentences.english: Want nothing that the thought of hearts can mend.
sentences.chinese: 连富幻想的心也不能加减丝毫。

sentences.english: Just like before, Caster's human rights are not respected at all.
sentences.chinese: 同以往一样，塞门娅的人权丝毫没有受到尊重。

sentences.english: At that time the scene is no worse than a horror film.
sentences.chinese: 当时的场景丝毫不逊于恐怖电影。

definition: not in the least/to completely lack
hardly/not in the least/not at all
erhua variant of 一點|一点[yi1 dian3]
contrary to what one might expect/actually/contrariwise/why don't you
but/yet/however/while/to go back/to decline/to retreat/nevertheless/even though
